<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script is to make application category field not mandatory when Business Application table is in global scope.</description>
        <name>Uncheck mandatory field of App Category</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function uncheckMandatoryFieldOfApplicationCategory() {
    var isTableInGlobalScope = false;
    var tableGr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
    tableGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_ci_business_app');
    tableGr.query();
    if (tableGr.next())
        if (tableGr.getValue('sys_scope') == 'global')
            isTableInGlobalScope = true;
    //If table is only in global scope we need to apply the fix
    //else it is not required as table and dictionary entry will be in apm scope.
    if (isTableInGlobalScope) {
        gs.info('Uncheck mandatory field of App Category: Business App table in Global Scope');
        //Query the dictionary entry for business applications table 
        //with column application_category that is in apm scope
        var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        dictionaryGr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_ci_business_app');
        dictionaryGr.addQuery('element', 'application_category');
        dictionaryGr.addQuery('mandatory', true);
        dictionaryGr.addQuery('sys_scope.scope', 'sn_apm');
        dictionaryGr.query();
        if (dictionaryGr.next()) {
            gs.info('Uncheck mandatory field of App Category: Unchecking mandatory field of Application category of sys_dictionary entry with sys_id ' + dictionaryGr.sys_id + ' to false');
            dictionaryGr.setValue('mandatory', false);
            if (dictionaryGr.update()) {
                gs.info('Uncheck mandatory field of App Category: Unchecking mandatory field of Application category to false was successful');
            }
        }
    } else
        gs.info('Uncheck mandatory field of App Category: No changes needed for updating Application category field.');
}


gs.info('Uncheck mandatory field of App Category: Starting Uncheck mandatory field of App Category fix script');

uncheckMandatoryFieldOfApplicationCategory();

gs.info('Uncheck mandatory field of App Category: Ending Uncheck mandatory field of App Category fix script');]]></script>
